name: All English Idioms & Phrases
description: This is helpful app to you can learn Idioms , Phrases and Proverbs in English very easily and effectively. It has more than 10000 idioms and phrases, it will help you search easily and effectively  Features: - Popular English Idioms - English Idioms Dictionary - Favorite English Idioms - English proverbs with their meaning - Most Common Phrasal Verbs - American Slang Dictionary - Idioms Quizzes - Phrasal Verb Quizzes
